News Highlights           College receives $2.8M from private donor to enhance early childhood teacher prep programs  Monday, April 6, 2020  The UIC College of Education has received a $2.8 million gift from Marjorie Pelino to help expand the number of early childhood teachers in Chicago and surrounding areas. Financial Aid  UIC students received $6.9 million in total assistance in 2017-18.             Community Engagement  We work with schools and community centers across Chicago to improve educational and life outcomes.             Events  Workshops, lectures, student organization meetings and more.              Community Impact  The College of Education is dedicated to serving communities locally, nationally and globally, strengthening life opportunities for children and their families.
